title: Greater Albion Typefounders Releases Absinette
content:
Greater Albion's latest release is Absinette,which takes us straight back to 19th century France. Its a decorative family of Roman faces in three widths as well as a more elaborate inline style, ideal for posters with an Edwardian or Victorian theme. Here's a quick preview image:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014125238im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Absinette_5822.png)

More samples of Absinette in action can be seen at [Greater Albion's blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014125238/http:/gatf.wordpress.com/)

Absinette released via [MyFonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014125238/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/gatf/absinette/).
author: Rasendyll
